ygData.subject: Re: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: Rubicite BP- 19ac, effect Rubicite Aura ( 5hp regen sitting, 4hp regen standing ) Rubicite Leggings - 12 ac ( I think ) Rubicite Boots - 8 or 9 ac Rubicite
ygData.messageBody:
Rubicite BP- 19ac, effect Rubicite Aura ( 5hp regen sitting, 4hp regen standing )
Rubicite Leggings - 12 ac ( I think )
Rubicite Boots - 8 or 9 ac
Rubicite Gloves - not sure about ac
Rubicite Helm 12 ac ( I think )/Nightshade Wreath 1ac, 5wis/int
Mammoth Hide 8ac ( i think ), 4wis
Mithril Bracers - 4ac, 3str, 5wis each
Gold Jasper earrings - 3 wis each
Plat Jasper rings - 6wis each
Plat Ruby Veil - 7wis/7str
Blackened Medalion - 3wis ( had this forever :P )
Enchanted Morning Star - 1hb, 7dmg 30del, 2str 5wis
Paw of Opallo - +9ac ( I think ), 9agi, 9wis, -5cha
a belt from the ogre camp in W.K - +5agi some hp I think
Adamentite Epaulets- 9ac, 7wis
my human wis was 90, now it's 161 ( with the nightshade on ) not the best cleric inventory but I do like the rubicite look, of course the purple one is better! :P

Levo Nife
LvL50 human cleric on Bertox
----- Original Message -----
From: Cliff, Monty
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 5:40 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Equipment?




Well, I consider myself to be under equipped for my level (getting harder to
say that now that I have some purple stuff) as I have had a few items for
almost 30 levels now. Anyway I'll give you a run down on the items I wear.

+3 wis earring (2) (can't remember what they are called)
+6 wis ring (2) (ditto)
Runed Circlet 4ac +4wis/int
BI Medallion +3 wis/int (have had this forever it seems)
Plat ruby veil +7 wis/st
Mirthil BP 17ac +15 agi
Mirthil Bracer (2) 4ac +3st +5wis
Adamentium Epaulets (sp?) 9ac +7wis
Charred boots 6ac +3agi +fire/pois I think
Charred guardian shield 10ac +9wis
Caduceus of Sacrament or my shovel for 2hb :)
Bronze gloves woo hoo
Bronze cloak don't see L50's with bronze everyday
Ethernal Mist Vembracers 15ac +9st +magic (was plat armband)
Ethernal Mist Leggings 14ac +5st/agi +9wis +dis/pois (was gator legs)
Girdle of the Diligent 10ac +5wis/sta (was belt of the river)

All those stats are just from memory so I'm sure there are some errors. I
have never enjoyed camping for stuff especially when no exp is involved
(hence the cloak) and I refuse to pay some of the prices people want for
stuff. As an example this past weekend at the bazaar someone was selling a
nightshade wreath (1ac +5wis/int) and the opening bid was 2k plat (not like I
even have that much). Now compare this to the runed circlet which I paid 400
plat for and tell me if it's worth another 1600 plat.

Drogo DarkBane
L50 Halfling Cleric
The Rathe

P.S. Getting absolutly nothing done at work today. Keep the mails coming :o

From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>

Drago,

What type of armor do you use, if i may ask...

Sianne
Xegony
